author: wn.com
title: ‘Common sense prevailed’ in SAFE Act ruling
text: Gov. Andrew Cuomo on Monday hailed a federal appeals court’s decision to uphold much of the state’s 2013 gun-control laws, using it to again call for stronger national gun measures. The U.S. Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit found much of the SAFE Act was constitutional, aside from a measure requiring gun owners to [...] The post Cuomo: ‘Common sense prevailed’ in SAFE Act ruling appeared first on Politics on the Hudson.
